v1: All I once held dear built my life upon,
All this world reveres and wars to own,
All I once thought gain I have counted loss,
Spent and worthless now compared to this.
c1: You’re my all, You’re the best,
v2: Now my heart’s desire is to know You more,
To be found by You and known as Yours,
To possess by faith what I could not earn:
v3: Oh, to know the pow’r of Your risen life,
And to know You in Your sufferings,
To become like You in Your death my Lord
So with You to live and never die.

v1: All that I am, all that I have,
I lay them down before You, O Lord.
All my regrets, all my acclaim,
The joy and the pain, I'm making them Yours.
c1: Lord, I offer my life to You,
Lord, I offer my days to You,
Lifting my praise to You as a pleasing sacrifice,
Lord, I offer You my life.
v2: Things in the past, things yet unseen,
Wishes and dreams that are yet to come true.
All of my hopes, all of my plans,
My heart and my hands are lifted to You.
